languages.text: {n}От вида ксеноса, развалившегося на троне главы династии, Абеляр становится багровым.{/n} "Да... как... пошла вон от святыни Империума, ксеносская тварь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}От вида ксеноса, развалившегося на троне главы династии, Абеляр становится багровым.{/n} "Да... как... пошла вон от святыни Империума, ксеносская тварь!"

languages.text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"
languages.original_text: {n}От вида ксеноса, развалившегося на троне главы династии, Абеляр становится багровым.{/n} "Да... как... пошла вон от святыни Империума, ксеносская тварь!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"
{n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn purple.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"
{n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

{n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

languages.text: {n}À la vue d'une xénos avachie sur le trône royal, le visage d'Abélard vire au cramoisi.{/n} « Que... comment... Cessez immédiatement de profaner une relique de l'Imperium par votre présence, misérable ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}À la vue d'une xénos avachie sur le trône royal, le visage d'Abélard vire au cramoisi.{/n} « Que... comment... Cessez immédiatement de profaner une relique de l'Imperium par votre présence, misérable ! »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德看见玛拉斋懒洋洋地坐在王朝的宝座上，气得满脸通红。{/n}“……什么……你怎么敢……你竟敢玷污帝国的圣物，你这异形渣滓！”
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德看见玛拉斋懒洋洋地坐在王朝的宝座上，气得满脸通红。{/n}“……什么……你怎么敢……你竟敢玷污帝国的圣物，你这异形渣滓！”

languages.text: {n}Der Anblick eines Xenos, der es sich auf dem dynastischen Thron gemütlich gemacht hat, lässt Abelard die Zornesröte ins Gesicht steigen.{/n} "Was ... Wie seid ... Ihr unterlasst es augenblicklich, ein Relikt des Imperiums durch Eure Anwesenheit zu schänden, Xenos-Abschaum!"
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Anblick eines Xenos, der es sich auf dem dynastischen Thron gemütlich gemacht hat, lässt Abelard die Zornesröte ins Gesicht steigen.{/n} "Was ... Wie seid ... Ihr unterlasst es augenblicklich, ein Relikt des Imperiums durch Eure Anwesenheit zu schänden, Xenos-Abschaum!"

languages.text: {n}Al ver a un xenos descansando sobre el trono dinástico, la cara de Abelard se enrojece.{/n} «¿Qué...? ¿Cómo...? ¡Deja de profanar una reliquia del Imperio con tu presencia, escoria xenos!».
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al ver a un xenos descansando sobre el trono dinástico, la cara de Abelard se enrojece.{/n} «¿Qué...?». ¿Cómo...?». ¡Deja de profanar una reliquia del Imperio con tu presencia, escoria xenos!».

languages.text: {n}王朝の王座でくつろぐ異種族の姿を見て、アベラルドは顔を真っ赤にさせる。{/n}「なっ…どうして…その存在で帝国の遺物を汚すのはやめろ、異種族めが！」
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}王朝の王座でくつろぐ異種族の姿を見て、アベラルドは顔を真っ赤にさせる。{/n}「なっ…どうして…その存在で帝国の遺物を汚すのはやめろ、異種族めが！」

languages.text: {n}Kraliyet tahtına yerleşmiş zenoyu görünce Abelard'ın yüzü kızarıyor.{/n} "Ne?.. Nasıl?.. Zeno köpeği, İmparatorluk yadigârına saygısızlık etmene müsaade etmem!"
languages.original_text: {n}The sight of a xenos lounging on the dynastic throne makes Abelard's face turn crimson.{/n} "What... How did... You will cease defiling a relic of the Imperium with your presence, xenos scum!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kraliyet tahtında yayışan zenoyu görünce Abelard’ın yüzü kızarıyor.{/n} "Ne... Nasıl... Zeno köpeği, İmparatorluk yadigârına saygısızlık etmene izin vermem!"
